task_name: Backend: Implement Core Jint Transformation Engine
resource_notes: Requires deep understanding of Jint library internals and .NET/JS interop.
alternative_approach: Use a different JS engine, but Jint is a hard requirement.
risk_factors: Performance limitations of Jint with large JSON objects.

task_name: Backend: Implement Secure Jint Sandbox Constraints
resource_notes: Security-critical task. Requires meticulous implementation and testing of all constraints.
alternative_approach: None. Sandbox is a core security requirement.
risk_factors: Potential for sandbox escape vulnerabilities in Jint library.
mitigation_strategy: Formal security review; implement extensive negative testing.

task_name: Backend: Implement Script CRUD API with Versioning
resource_notes: Requires robust database design for immutable versioning and transactional integrity.
alternative_approach: Simpler versioning (e.g., full object copy) could be faster but less space-efficient.
risk_factors: Database performance with a large number of script versions.
mitigation_strategy: Index version tables appropriately; design queries for performance.

task_name: Frontend: Integrate Monaco Editor for Script Editing
resource_notes: Requires expertise in integrating complex third-party components into React.
alternative_approach: Use a simpler editor like CodeMirror, but Monaco is a requirement.
risk_factors: Monaco editor bundle size impacting load performance.
mitigation_strategy: Implement lazy loading for the editor component.

task_name: Backend: Implement Preview API Endpoint with Timeout
resource_notes: Requires careful management of CancellationTokens through the entire call stack, including Jint execution.
alternative_approach: None. Timeout is a critical stability feature.
risk_factors: Long-running connector calls could block threads before timeout is triggered.
mitigation_strategy: Ensure all I/O operations in the preview path are fully async and honor the CancellationToken.

task_name: Backend: Implement Structured Script Error Handling
resource_notes: Focus on extracting meaningful, user-friendly error details from Jint's exception objects.
alternative_approach: Return raw exception message, but structured data is preferred.
risk_factors: Jint exceptions may not always provide line numbers for all error types.
mitigation_strategy: Extensive testing with various script error types to ensure robust parsing.

resource_notes: Requires a resizable pane component library or custom implementation. State management for loading/error/success states is key.
alternative_approach: Use a simpler, non-resizable layout, but this would be a UX downgrade.
risk_factors: Performance of rendering large JSON objects in the output pane.
mitigation_strategy: Use a virtualized JSON viewer for the output pane.

task_name: Frontend: Implement Version History & Visual Diff UI
resource_notes: Integration of a diff viewer (e.g., Monaco Diff Editor) is the main challenge. Needs careful state management for version selection.
alternative_approach: Use a text-based diff, but visual diff is a requirement.
risk_factors: Browser performance when diffing large scripts (RISK-005).
mitigation_strategy: Technical spike to evaluate diff libraries before implementation.

task_name: Frontend: Display Performance Warning in Report Config
resource_notes: Simple conditional rendering task in an existing component.
Requires instrumenting the Jint engine service to update counters and histograms.
alternative_approach: Use a different monitoring system, but Prometheus is the requirement.
risk_factors: Metrics collection could add performance overhead.
mitigation_strategy: Use efficient, thread-safe metric types and benchmark the overhead.

task_name: Backend: Implement Comprehensive Security Audit Logging
resource_notes: Requires designing an audit log schema that meets SOC 2 / ISO 27001 objectives. Integration points are key.
alternative_approach: Use basic text logging, but structured, immutable logging is required for compliance.
risk_factors: Audit logging failures could roll back primary transactions if not handled correctly.
mitigation_strategy: Use an out-of-process or fire-and-forget logging mechanism for auditing.

task_name: Documentation: Create User Guide and API Reference
resource_notes: Requires close collaboration with development team to ensure technical accuracy.
alternative_approach: Rely on auto-generated Swagger docs alone, but a user guide is required.
risk_factors: Documentation becoming out of sync with last-minute code changes.
mitigation_strategy: Include documentation updates in the Definition of Done for all feature tasks.
